entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: ¬µBrowser: Watch Web Browser
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

¬µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch. ¬µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around. Features: - Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard) - Search the web with DuckDuckGo - See your last visited pages - Save pages from the history to your favorites - iOS companion app to manage bookmarks - Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face Please note: ¬µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size. Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers TD
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • Sha'traÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]
  • GrawlÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]
  • KahzÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]
  • AshbiteÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • KutsaoÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • SaitamÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • BonehartÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Captain BlackthorneÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Sha'traÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • NivusÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • GrawlÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • KahzÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • KarkinosÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • AshbiteÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • KutsaoÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: MONOPOLY
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Speed Die & New York ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Explorer PackÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Orient ExpressÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New York 2121 BoardÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • The Complete CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Welcome OfferÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Big Cities USA Explorer PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Speed Die & New York ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Champions Token BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Victorian London BoardÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Euro TripÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions ‚Äì no ads, no fuss! Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY 1. Download the official MONOPOLY app 2. Press ‚ÄúPLAY‚Äù 3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token 4. Roll the dice and move around the board 5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it 6. Collect rent when other players land on it 7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed ‚Äì will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 8. If you run out of money, you‚Äôll be bankrupt and out of the game 9. The last player left with a profit wins! FEATURES - MONOPOLY ON THE GO ‚Äì No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! - MULTIPLE MODES ‚Äì Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! - EXCLUSIVE BOARDS ‚Äì Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! - AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE ‚Äì Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game. Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game! The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. ¬© 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Zero One Progrise
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Zero One Progrise brings you a complete fan-made encyclopedia of characters, Riders, Drivers, and fun quizzes. Features Character Encyclopedia: Learn about Aruto Hiden, Isamu Fuwa, Yua Yaiba, Gai Amatsu, Horobi, Jin, and more. Rider Gallery: Explore Zero-One, Vulcan, Valkyrie, Thouser, Horobi, Jin, and their different forms. Driver Showcase: Discover the Hiden Zero-One Driver, AIMS Shotriser, Thousandriver, and more ‚Äì tap to play original transform sounds. Quiz Challenge: Test your knowledge of characters, forms, and story details with fun trivia games. Immersive Experience: Relive the excitement with custom artwork and sound effects. Disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan app.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Hello World!Ôºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
